body_html:
@vap31 as the most recent version of anaconda is incorporated with python 3.6. you may change the commands to
conda create -n tensorflow python=3.6
activate tensorflow
pip install --ignore-installed --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.2.0-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl
body_text:
@vap31 as the most recent version of anaconda is incorporated with python 3.6. you may change the commands to
conda create -n tensorflow python=3.6
activate tensorflow
pip install --ignore-installed --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.2.0-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl
body:
@vap31 as the most recent version of anaconda is incorporated with python 3.6. you may change the commands to 
conda create -n tensorflow python=3.6
 activate tensorflow
pip install --ignore-installed --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.2.0-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl
